text:
Botmock | Front-end Engineer | Ottawa, Remote (USA/Canada)

Botmock is a powerful prototyping tool for conversational apps for platforms like Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Facebook Messenger, Apple Business Chat and more. We are looking to hire a front-end engineer that can help us take our application to next stage.

https://botmock.com

We have a simple and honest hiring process and usually make a decision with 48 hours of our interview call.

Interested? Email me at obaid@botmock.com and let's talk!
